ValidationRule.description: PC Onboarding Format field is required when moving the status to Discovery with Probability: 40%
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), BEGINS($RecordType.DeveloperName, 'PC'), OR( BEGINS($Profile.Name,'PC Sales Administration - SB'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'PC Sales Manager - SB'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'PC Sales Rep - SB') ), Probability>=0.40, ISBLANK(TEXT(Onboarding_Format__c)), OR( ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'AUTO'), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,"BOP (Business Owner's Package)"), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Disability'), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Umbrella'), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Workers Comp'), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'General Liability'), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Errors and Omissions') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PC Onboarding Format field is required when moving the status to Discovery with Probability: 40%
